root.name: Wing Commander II: Vengeance of the Kilrathi
root.description: TriviaThe CD-ROM version is one fo the first games to use extended voice acting.The FM Towns version has cd quality music instead of midi.A SNES version was planned and created, but never released.Internally at Origin the main character was nicknamed "Bluehair" for his distinctive blue hair in the cinemas coupled with the fact the player could name him whatever he wanted.
